EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Pivotal_Roadshow_Q216.Reminder - NYC
EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow at the Pivotal Cloud Native Roadshow!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Cloud Native Roadshow taking place tomorrow in New York.
Pivotal Cloud Native Roadshow—New York Thursday, June 16th, 2016 8:30am – 9:30am Breakfast 9:30am – 12:00pm Sessions 12:00pm – 1:00pm Lunch 1:00pm – 3:30pm Sessions Roadshow Agenda <[[http://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow/newyork?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=pivotal-roadshow-2016-NYC]]>
Location Pivotal New York <[[http://pivotal.io/locations/newyork]]> 625 Avenue of Americas Second Floor New York, NY 10011 Map & Directions <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Pivotal+Labs/@40.7402796,-73.9950834,15z/data=!4m5!3m4!1s0x0:0xad7f9c23ffc3e702!8m2!3d40.7402796!4d-73.9950834]]>
Questions? Contact Paul Santos at psantos@pivotal.io <[[mailto:psantos@pivotal.io]]>.
We look forward to seeing you!
The Pivotal Team
